articles.title: Apple shares rise as sales fall less than feared despite China decline - Financial Times
articles.description: Tech giant announces $110bn in share buybacks and raises quarterly dividend by 4%

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Gazprom falls to first annual loss in 20 years as trade with Europe hit - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Results highlight the dramatic decline of Gazprom since Russia launched its full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022.
articles.content: Kremlin-owned gas giant Gazprom has said it plunged to a net loss of 629 billion roubles ($6.9bn) in 2023, its first annual loss in more than 20 years, amid dwindling gas trade with Europe, once its … [+2212 chars]
